nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Scorpius (Mayor)\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Special Candidate\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Bribe\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"If Scorpius wins and you voted\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"for him, Mayor Scorpius will\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"offer you \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"50,000 - 1M coins\",\"color\":\"gold\"}]}","{\"text\":\"as a token of gratitude.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Darker Auctions\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"Scorpius will intrude in Dark\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"Auctions, increasing the\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"amount of rounds to 8 and\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"offering special items.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"This is a SPECIAL candidate!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","{\"text\":\"It rarely appears!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"SCORPIUS_SPECIAL_MAYOR_MONSTER"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
